post:
Hello,
We are SetraHost!

Have you always wanted to make a website, but don't want to pay a lot of money every month to do so? Host your website(s) for an entire year for only $5. And the year after. And the year after. The price never goes up! Use coupon code 50OFF to get a lifetime discount of 50% on all of our plans.

We know you’ll love our services, but if at any chance you don’t, we do provide a 30 day money back guarantee. Your happiness is our first priority.

MORE INFORMATION ON DISCOUNT:

50% OFF ALL YEARLY PLANS
Receive 50% off all of our yearly plans for the lifetime of your account with us.
CODE: 50OFF

Some of the features we offer!
Latest version of cPanel Control Panel
Softaculous Auto Installer - Auto install Wordpress & 400+ other scripts with ease
99.9% Uptime - We have a public uptime page for you to track this. We are at 100% uptime!
LiteSpeed + LCache - We’re optimized for wordpress blogs!
Pure SSD Raid10 Servers
FREE Daily backups - We got you covered! (Some hosts charge just for you to receive backups and disable the backup wizard in your cpanel so you can’t create your own)
FREE SSL certificate
We don’t oversell our servers
We provide live support
30 Day Money Back Guarantee

HOSTING PLANS:
(Ranging from only $5-25 per year!)

BEGINNER
1 GB SSD Storage
100 GB Monthly Bandwidth
5 FTP Accounts, Emails & Sub-Domains
$10 PER YEAR / 50% OFF = $5 PER YEAR (That's less than 50 cents per month!)
Order Now

BASIC
3 GB SSD Storage
200 GB Monthly Bandwidth
20 FTP Accounts, Emails, Databases & Sub-Domains
$2 PER MONTH / $20 PER YEAR *SAVE $4* + 50% OFF =
$10 PER YEAR (That’s only 83 cents per month)
Order Now

PREMIUM
5 GB SSD Storage
350 GB Monthly Bandwidth
Unlimited FTP Accounts, Emails, Databases & Sub-Domains
$3 per month / $30 per year *SAVE $6* + 50% OFF =
$15 PER YEAR (That’s only 1.25 per month)
Order Now

BUSINESS
20 GB SSD Storage
Unlimited Monthly Bandwidth
Unlimited FTP Accounts, Emails & Sub-Domains
$5 per month / $50 year *SAVE $10* + 50% OFF =
$25 PER YEAR (That’s only $2 per month)
Order now


ABOUT US AND OUR MISSION:
We began working in the hosting industry in 2005 as a hobby, but it became so much more.
We continue to have genuine love for what we do and constantly strive to deliver quality services for a price that you can afford.

Our goal is to make it so you can completely focus on your website and not constantly worry about your host being down or always having issues. Don't worry though because if you do need assistance, we put extensive focus on Customer Support and are always here to help. Even in the middle of the night.

We're a small company who doesn't see our customers as just a number, this is a little family and we're excited to have you a part of it!

CHECK US OUT

Visit us at SetraHost.com / If you have any questions about us, feel free to contact us!

We also have live support on throughout each day, so feel free to go to SetraHost.com and open up a chat!

Thank you for taking your time to check us out and we look forward to welcoming you to the Setra family!
